.. index:: OrderedMultisetAggregate

.. _l4f7264657265644d756c7469736574416767726567617465:

OrderedMultisetAggregate S
==========================

:viewcode:`aggcat.spad line 708 <aggcat.spad#L708>` :editcode:`[edit on github] <aggcat.spad#L708>`

* S: \ :ref:`OrderedSet <l4f726465726564536574>`\ 


An ordered-multiset aggregate is a multiset built over an ordered set \ ``S``\  so that the relative sizes of its entries can be assessed. These aggregates serve as models for priority queues.


.. _l4f7264657265644d756c7469736574416767726567617465-23:
